name: Last Day (O2A2 VN Jam)
description:
A small short-story for O2A2 2021 Game Jam

Description of the story:

The world is facing a potential disaster. The asteroid is on its way to Earth. It’s a matter of minutes

when it arrives. Only you and your mother, Ally, are left together while the rest

of the world is in panic of the impending doom. Every word you say to Ally

and she says to you could be the last thing either of you say to each other.

Credit:

Knightmare - Coding, Writer, Character Art, Background Editor, Sound

Design, Music Design, Asset Designer

Discora - Background Designer, Writer
